T02khasrpsu:1: iha śubhaṅkaranāmā upāsakaḥ śubhakarmakārī karuṇāyamānaḥ sa kila potalakagamanodyataḥ /
T02khasrpsu:5: mā gaccha tvam ihāsmān vairocanābhisaṃbodhitantrarājakrameṇa sthāpaya tena mahān satvārtho bhaviṣyati /
T02khasrpsu:9: tathā hi varaṃ bhikṣoḥ śīlavipattir na punar dṛṣṭivipattir iti /
T02khasrpsu:10: atas tatra tāvat kṣaṇikān nirātmakān sarvadharmān vyavalokya vyapagatasakalavikalpaḥ kṛpāśayo 'ho vatāmī satvāḥ kleśakarmādibhir upadrutāḥ /
T02khasrpsu:13: tato 'haṃ lokeśvaro bhūtvā teṣāṃ duḥkhādy apanayāmi /
T02khasrpsu:15: ity evaṃ pratijñāśayaṃ kṛtvā svahṛdi paṃkārajasahaśradalapadmavarāṭakamadhye akārajacandramaṇḍalopari āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ iti pañca bījāni vinyasya /
T02khasrpsu:16: etadraśmimālābhiḥ sañcodyānīya tān gurubuddhabodhisatvān gaganatale purovartinaḥ kṛtvā vandanāpūjāpāpadecanātrisaraṇagamanādisaptavidhāṃ pūjām ekadaśadhāṃ vā kṛtvā maitrīkaruṇādicaturbrahmavihārī bhāvanāṃ kuryāt tataḥ
T02khasrpsu:17: śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham ity uccārya śūnyatābodhim kṛtvā bhagavān avalokiteśvaro yoginātmanā bhūyate /
T02khasrpsu:50: rakṣa o māṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā // oṃ vajrarekhe hūṃ maṇḍalamantraḥ // oṃ āgaccha bhagavan maṇḍalakasiṃhāsane oṃ āḥ iti mantrakṛtādhyeṣāṇāyāṃ kṛtamaṇḍalamadhyasiṃhāsanopari sahasradalapadmasthapañcātmakam pūjayed iti
T02khasrpsu:59: / pūjādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ // oṃ āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ phaṭ svāhā // oṃ sarvatathāgatasulalitanamitair namāmi bhagavantaṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ pratīccha kusumāñjalir nātha hoḥ /
T02khasrpsu:63: gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇa ntu sarvabhautikā imaṃ baliṃ svāhā /
T02khasrpsu:65: atha pūjārambhakāle evam uccārya cittaṃ śodhanīyaṃ /
T02khasrpsu:70: tadā rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ syāt /
T02khasrpsu:71: iha sarva eva satvā rāgadveṣamohāśayāḥ // tathā hi
T02khasrpsu:72: rāgajakuśalamūlena nandopanandau nāgarājānau dveṣajena rāgeṇa mohajena vaiśravaṇo yakṣo bhūtaḥ
T02khasrpsu:73: ity ato rāgadveṣamohādīn parihṛtya cittaśuddhyā karuṇāyamānacittena sarvāṇy eva dānādikuśalamūlāni kartavyāni /
